title: Acropolis is definitely a must-see.
text: This is definitely a must-see. Make sure to prearrange or ask for that special lift if you have a disabled person in your group as climbing the rock can be tough for some. Another thing to be aware of if you visit Acropolis in summer is that the temperatures are really high with no shelter as you are basically at the top of a huge rock so it would be wise to have an umbrella and a bottle of water with you!
